website_summaries.verdict: Good covers, but many had trouble with sizing, which can affect fit and protection.
pros: Elastic across the top helps fit cover to the wheels
Protects from sun, dirt and corrosion
Comes in black, white and grey, in a variety of sizes
Heavy-duty vinyl with non-scratch, soft backing
Eyelet with cord ensures secure fit
cons: Cord is difficult to get over back tires

customer_reviews.title: I recommend them, I am a first time buyer
customer_reviews.text: These wheel covers arrived in a few days and fit perfectly. I recommend them, I am a first time buyer. They have an elastic section on the top so that they fit snugly and grommets on the bottom with included ropes to batten them onto the tires. The ropes are a little difficult to get onto the double rear tires, I will probably change those to bungee cords. Nice!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine McMahon

customer_reviews.title: But the next size up from your tire size.
customer_reviews.text: The covers are heavy duty and should last for a long time. Just put them on and the only thing I didn’t like was the rope they give you to tie the back together. The other covers we had came with a bungee cord which would have been nice. Other than that I think I will be happy with these. I did order them one size up from my tire dimensions (I have 27” tires) as others suggested. They fit the tire good but were a little long. I actually like that after getting them on because nothing will get at the bottom of the tire then.
customer_reviews.author: MrsBee

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: These are the highest quality I have ever used. Super thick padding on the inside that doesn't leave lint on your tires, and super thick vinyl to protect the tires. I'm out in Phx, AZ and it is REAL HOT here. They do change color and fade a bit from the intense sun in AZ , but does not effect the material at all.
customer_reviews.author: MikeBinAZ

customer_reviews.title: Protect those RV tires from harmful UV
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a new motorhome and we have to store it outside for the winter. I wanted to protect the tires from UV damage. These covers do the trick. Order by tire diameter. My tires are at the bottom side of this size range, so there is some extra cover after the wheel is covered. They seem to be well made. For the price they are first rate.
customer_reviews.author: T & T Foley

customer_reviews.title: Great Covers to protect your aluminum wheel rims from the sea water
customer_reviews.text: I bought two sets of these wheel covers for my parents 38 foot Monaco Motorhome for Christmas, their wheels measured 38inches. They own an RV pad in Newport, Oregon and are very close to the beach. The seawater eats away at the outside aluminum wheel rims. My father says they fit perfect and feels it will protect the wheel rims from rusting so bad. I would recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Deniece McNamara

customer_reviews.title: Just got them installed so I can't say how long ...
customer_reviews.text: Just got them installed so I can't say how long they'll last. The seem well made. If your tires are in the upper half of the size spread, go 1 size larger. They might be a little loose but they'll be far easier to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Dick F.

customer_reviews.title: Leader Wheel cover
customer_reviews.text: I received one wheel cover as the package had been opened en-route. As for the quality of the wheel cover I did receive it was excellent! The workmanship is superior, finely sewn and of excellent material. The wheel cover has good fit and coverage to keep the sun off. This company gladly refunded my money as only one wheel cover showed up. I plan on trying to find the same wheel covers locally. Very kind and considerate company to do business with, I would highly recommend this company.
customer_reviews.author: Supahorsenut

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Just received these wheel covers and installed them on our 5th Wheel RV. They fit snug on our 31" diameter wheels. They fit well enough that I did not use the tie down ropes that came with the covers. Time will tell if I made a mistake by not using the ropes. They look great on the wheels. I wish I could have got them in Tan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality item
customer_reviews.text: A good thick high quality vinyl that should hold up well. I appreciated the grommets and cord included so they could be secured in case of bad weather. These covers not only help make the trailer look smart but also preserve the tires and in sunny California they are a necessity.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to get on and adjust.
customer_reviews.text: These wheel covers were delivered very quickly. They are of excellent quality. We were pleased at the ease of getting them on and in place. They've stayed secure through some hellish Wyoming winds. Would definitely order from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Wyoming Gramma

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: As expected. Have not experienced harsh weather as yet. Have not had to tie them to the wheel, but the grommets make it easy to do so. Probably will go with some sort of bungee strap rather that that rope that was supplied with them.
customer_reviews.author: John Martin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, looks great
customer_reviews.text: These fit my fifth wheel really well. They wrap nicely around the wheel and completely protect it from the sun. The covers come with line to tie the bottom of the cover together. I'll probably be getting a few small bungee cords to replace the included line but other than that wouldn't change a thing.
customer_reviews.author: Russ Lowenthal

customer_reviews.title: Superior Quality
customer_reviews.text: PRODUCT: Pleasantly surprised at extremely high quality. Outer layer seems strong and durable. Inner lining is soft, but also appears durable. Grommets feel substantial and up to their required task. Cinch ropes provided are large diameter and generous in length; I cut them in half and had more than enough to secure the wheel covers. PRICING/SERVICE: Wheel covers were purchased from Amazon Warehouse Deals, and arrived in damaged packaging, as described; but items were in perfect condition. Great deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Pezfest

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and effective way to protect your tires while parked
customer_reviews.text: Fit as designed - had to spend lots of $$ for new tires on my motorhome due to rot from exposure to UV/Ozone. The inside dual tires looked perfect on the sidewalls and the outer tires were dangerously rotted. Worth the price to extend the life of the tires!
customer_reviews.author: Pedro DePacas

customer_reviews.title: I about gave up
customer_reviews.text: I looked and looked for quality wheel covers for our RV. I was just ready to settle for another brand when I found these. High quality. Very easy to put on. Stayed on even in the wind. Look like new after one year.
customer_reviews.author: No Goats

customer_reviews.title: Sun Protection for Tires
customer_reviews.text: These tire covers fit perfectly on our large pick-up truck tires. We bought them to protect the tires from the sun which caused our previous tires to crack even though they did not have too many miles on them. They fit well and stay put even in the wind.
customer_reviews.author: Jet

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: They seem to be constructed of very thick quality material with good seams which I need in AZ, they fit as advertised for my size tires. They cost a hair more than others but good items. I'm very happy with these tire covers.
customer_reviews.author: GBig

customer_reviews.title: WORTH CHOOSING
customer_reviews.text: These covers are made of a heavier vinyl. They fit just right on all four tires, came with a white cord and two grommet holes on either side of tire to secure in case of wind. We have parked our RV at an outside storage facility and put these covers on. I expect them to do well over the winter months here in central Idaho.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Dalgleish

customer_reviews.title: HEAVY DUTY
customer_reviews.text: These tire covers are twice the thickness of my old ones. The rope tie down system isn't the best in my opinion. I am using the elastic cords from my old covers to secure these new covers onto the RV tires. If not secured they will blow off the tire.
customer_reviews.author: michael cooper

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: The covers were really easy to put on. I can't rate durability as it is only December and our weather forecasters are saying that the first months of 2020, here in Northeast Ohio, are going to be bad. Hopefully they withstand the weather elements
customer_reviews.author: Gayle H.

customer_reviews.title: Great tire covers
customer_reviews.text: Great tire covers. Our horse trailer sets out in the sun 24/7 we wanted to protect the tires from the sun. These fit perfect, they are easy to put on and take off, they are staying on even in the wind. Love them
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Vestal

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Tire Covers
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Tire Covers,heavy duty,very easy to install,will not come off in the wind and looks great,very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: RickieDean

customer_reviews.title: Good material and tire coverage
customer_reviews.text: These covers come with a section of rope that it is expected to be laced through the two eyelets and draw these covers tight around the back side of the tire. The problem is that you have to reach around the tire to do this and in my case it was on a motor home with dual rear tires. The only way to do this would have had me crawling under the unit and getting quite dirty. The cover sits just fine without the tie.
customer_reviews.author: Still Satisfied

customer_reviews.title: Hoping for extended tire life
customer_reviews.text: Appear to be well made. Hope they extend the life of tires on a trailer used a few times each year.
customer_reviews.author: JBMMS

customer_reviews.title: Just know these are very nice
customer_reviews.text: These are nice, very nice! Not like the cheap, disappointing ones I have regretfully purchased in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Lou M.

customer_reviews.title: Thick Vinyl Material
customer_reviews.text: Material was thick vinyl material that looks to be thick enough to take the winter salt and snowy beatings. Bought these for a 16ft work trailer and they fit fine. I did not use the rope to tie them up. I bought the smallest bungee cords at the hardware store. The grommets are brass or something but they are sewn in tight and the bungee cords hold well. I expect these covers to last.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P.

customer_reviews.title: Must Have ! - These covers  extend the life of my truck tires, RV tires and Trailer Tires.
customer_reviews.text: Great price ! ...A little thinner than I though they would be but OK. Elastic makes them EZ to install - included ropes were not needed. Ask me again again in a few years about the durability - LOL !
customer_reviews.author: Charles E. Rannacher

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: These covers fit well and the elastic keeps them in place even without using the ties. So easy to get on and off the tires that there is no reason to keep my tires uncovered, whether stored or at the campground.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and durable and quality item!
customer_reviews.text: We did end up having to return product as our diameter was 27", but they were about 4" too long for our camper tires. Needed something that was at the 27" inch mark, not a span of 26 - 29". They were very thick and beautiful though!
customer_reviews.author: Snowflower

customer_reviews.title: TIRE COVER THAT ARE HEAVY DUTY
customer_reviews.text: These tire covers are extremely durable. Looks and feels like vinyl on the outside and felt on the inside. I don't even need to tie them they stay in place even in the harshest winds and rain without tying them. The construction and the materials that these are made of are definitely NOT a one or two season use they should last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: LUKE

customer_reviews.title: Good material and tire coverage
customer_reviews.text: These covers come with a section of rope that it is expected to be laced through the two eyelets and draw these covers tight around the back side of the tire. The problem is that you have to reach around the tire to do this and in my case it was on a dual axle car hauler that is low to the ground. The only way to do this would have had me crawling under the unit and getting quite dirty. The cover sits just fine without the tie.
customer_reviews.author: Still Satisfied

customer_reviews.title: Look and fit great
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and fit my 14-inch tires perfectly! The canvas is very nice and they look great!
customer_reviews.author: snowbug

customer_reviews.title: Great Tire and Wheel cover
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a well made tire cover. Would definitely recommend these covers for your tires
customer_reviews.author: Ernie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Fits as advertised, material is heavy, should last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Noto

customer_reviews.title: Great Tire Covers
customer_reviews.text: I use them on my F-150. Fits well when I don’t use the truck for a time. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: I only received one of the four wheel covers. ...
customer_reviews.text: I only received one of the four wheel covers. Just opened package today and only one wheel cover was in the package.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Carr

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected and they fit great. Made of thick material not cheap at all great price for the quality. If your looking for tire covers these be the ones!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleased thus Far
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these to cover the tires on our 4-Horse Logan. First impression are that they are a good quality and fit snug. We haven’t had them long enough to judge whether they will last, hope we can get 2 years out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Great invention
customer_reviews.text: After the first tire I got the hang of wrapping around but dual tires at rear of motorhome was a challenge.
customer_reviews.author: NativeTexan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, fit well and easy to install. Exactly what I needed to cover my expensive camper wheels.
customer_reviews.author: D.Brown

customer_reviews.title: every nice well made thick covers
customer_reviews.text: every nice well made thick covers. the ties for these are NOT hard to use and if you find they are just use a small bungee cord. these covers have protected our camper wheels for the elements so far~would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Quality tire covers
customer_reviews.text: Tire covers seem great quality. Time will tell the truth after the weather puts them through the test. Fit is a little bit large being I am on the small side of the allowed specified size. Shipping was quick as well.
customer_reviews.author: Stu

customer_reviews.title: looks great (update)
customer_reviews.text: product looks great. have not installed covers yet. will do that shortly and reply. fits well on wheel on RV attaches very good and good construction of product
customer_reviews.author: Dale E. Pratt

customer_reviews.title: Fit Great!
customer_reviews.text: This product seems well built,and heavy vinyl as described. They fit quite well on my 28" diameter Tires almost feel that ties are not necessary but I went ahead and used small bungee cords in place of rope supplied.Won't know how well they weather for awhile but hoping for best.
customer_reviews.author: G.C.

customer_reviews.title: Not sure yet on durability
customer_reviews.text: Seems an acceptable product, can't tell about the durability- only had a couple of months. U hope to get 3 years out of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Nice thick covers stretchable on top to make installation easy
customer_reviews.text: Nice thick covers stretchable on top to make installation easy. Grommets at the bottom with rope to secure against very high winds, although I don’t think the ropes are needed.
customer_reviews.author: MikeS

customer_reviews.title: LONG LASTING.
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT PRODUCT FOR RV TIRE COVERS, MOST LIKLY THE BEST.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Butrick

customer_reviews.title: A good buy!
customer_reviews.text: They are good and heavy and fit well, but they would be improved if they had bungee cords to secure they to the tire at the bottom instead of light rope.
customer_reviews.author: Greyhound Express

customer_reviews.title: Cover my 26" custom wheels from the weather and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Cover my 26" custom wheels from the weather and the neighborhood dogs. Less cleaning I have to do, I just pull the covers off and go.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Smith

customer_reviews.title: Regret buying into the photos in the listing...
customer_reviews.text: These don't fit like the nice photo. Not at all. Way over sized...just wonky ugly! (Yes, I ordered the correct size).
customer_reviews.author: John G.

customer_reviews.title: These covers seem to be good quality. They fit fine over the tires
customer_reviews.text: These covers seem to be good quality. They fit fine over the tires, but simply use a drawstring to secure them. I will probably utilize bungees to replace the cord.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Y.

customer_reviews.title: Motor Home Wheel Covers that were Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit! Exactly what I was looking for at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Dondish

customer_reviews.title: Very Good  quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to cover the tires on our RV and weere very easy to install and take off. I am glad I made the decision to purchase them.
customer_reviews.author: John E Cordova

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and very high equality
customer_reviews.text: Great looking and very high equality. Easy to install and will last many years. Great price and very very happy whith this product. Tried others and this is the nest.
customer_reviews.author: chancesrfarm

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I have just installed them so, need maybe a few months in this hot Texas sun to see how they hold up!!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Faries

customer_reviews.title: Fit good.
customer_reviews.text: cover 8 R 19.5 / 12 Ply Tires with no problem . Fit good.
customer_reviews.author: Robert G.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in spring for our motor home, they are well made stay in place. We received them when they said they would arrive. Hope to get many years out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Rose A

customer_reviews.title: Best I have seen!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for a RV or truck that is not used often. They are a quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Linda S. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: awesome wheel covers
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome wheel covers. Elastic at the top and can be tied at the bottom. Very nice and very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Rob O.

customer_reviews.title: Great..
customer_reviews.text: Great.....great....great. You are not going to regret this purchase. The color is perfect and the quality is on the money. Very happy .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Fit great, and easy removal. So far haven't needed to use cords to tie down, and have remained on even in several wind storms.
customer_reviews.author: BobC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, was exactly what I expected. Arrived quick! Only improvement suggestion would be a quick disconnect/connect assembly for customer to assemble for particular tire size, which I'm already working on for my tires!
customer_reviews.author: Dusty

customer_reviews.title: Great product, they do exactly what they were supposed to.
customer_reviews.text: They slide right on and fit like a glove. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Wayner

customer_reviews.title: Great RV tires cover
customer_reviews.text: great cover. It fits my RV 265/70r19.5 tires. I does what it claims to do. Simple enough.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Fit good, look great!
customer_reviews.text: A little loose but I expected that. My tires are on the small side of recommended. They are thicker than I expected, they should last longer than old ones.
customer_reviews.author: T J Wizard

customer_reviews.title: If you what wheel covers, don't miss out on these.
customer_reviews.text: Great product at a great price. Don't need the cord that is included, the elastic around the top hold them securely in place.
customer_reviews.author: Ebax

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These wheel covers are just perfect! They go on and remove easily. The elastic helps them to form fit right over the tire. Not only do they fit perfectly but they are sturdy enough to keep the sun's rays off the tires which is exactly what we were looking for. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel A. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Quality tire protection and they were quick to deliver their product! Will definitely use them again for future purchases!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Karol

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and affordable price. Fit my camper tires nicely :)
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Y

customer_reviews.title: As expected..... not exactly something ...
customer_reviews.text: As expected.....not exactly something one would go nuts over, but they do the job and are made of quality material.
customer_reviews.author: Cranberry Cabin

customer_reviews.title: Good delivery and ordering procedure
customer_reviews.text: Good delivery and ordering procedure. Material lighter fabric then I expected. The ad said heaviest on the market. It wasn't.. They should work ok though. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality. Ordered 0ne size bigger then tire size ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. Ordered 0ne size bigger then tire size called for. Easy on, easy off. Fully recommend to other RV'ers.
customer_reviews.author: American Patriot

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality product that is easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of how these were going to work however they are very easy to put on and take off. Nice heavy duty material and excellent quality
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: fit my 2016 thor axis, tiny bit large but very well made
customer_reviews.author: Lynda W.

customer_reviews.title: happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Covers fit perfectly and look to be made very well,happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Dennis J. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed that I have to crawl under the RV and tie them on with a rope.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Reetz

customer_reviews.title: How they are made & the quality for the money .
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with the quality and looks like they should last also the fit was right on . Would reccomend them by all means
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Was exactly what I was looking for. Price, Quality, looks and application. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice and big easy to put on . Grommets make it nice for tiedown. Love the gray color .
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Product good shipping sucked
customer_reviews.text: Product fit good and make well but as always 2 day prime is never 2 days always some excuse
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations on quality given the price. Very happy with them
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Good heavy material
customer_reviews.text: Good heavy product. I would give it 5 stars if it came with short bungee’s instead of ropes for securing.
customer_reviews.author: Golfzilla61

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice product seems to be good quality. Will update this review after we have had them a while
customer_reviews.author: Steven O

customer_reviews.title: Great value - shipped quickly!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Really like the material and how they fit - would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: RV Wheel Covers
customer_reviews.text: The wheel covers fit well. Material was a little light.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Christopher

customer_reviews.title: They are exactly what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: A little odd to put on but cover well and stay put
customer_reviews.author: Kate R

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are top quality and I look forward to getting many years of service from them.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur B.

customer_reviews.title: They fit perfect
customer_reviews.text: The tire covers look great and fit like a glove.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Riehle

customer_reviews.title: Super Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The quality appears to be quite good and the fit is perfect. I used an extra one to cover my rv bike rack.
customer_reviews.author: rob hammerle

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality and easy to install. We had a storm about a week after we placed the covers on with straight line wind of 90 MPH and they all stay on the tires.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, the nylon tie-down is a bit cumbersome but they stay on and work

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This my first year with them, so far so good

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: These are great quality and fit my RV tires like a glove. Very pleased.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice and heavy material fit just right for 16" wheel or 30" overall width
customer_reviews.author: bcook

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Should have ordered sooner. Happy with this item
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be as advertised, and a quality product. Two plus years in the sun and environment will be the proof. Very Satisfied.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are good quality covers however, I needed to return them because they did not fit.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Seem to be perfect size. we'll see how long they last in ...
customer_reviews.text: bought them for a lifted golf cart. Seem to be perfect size. we'll see how long they last in coastal conditions. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wheel covers for camper.
customer_reviews.text: Wheel covers arrived on time and are exactly as advertised.

customer_reviews.title: High quality and the price is right thanks.
customer_reviews.text: Great covers just what i ordered thanks poppyal al .

product_meta.title: Leader Accessories Tire Covers (4 Pack) Heavy Duty Waterproof Tire Cover Wheel Covers for RV Wheel Travel Trailer Camper Car Truck Jeep SUV Fits 32"-34.5" Diameter Tires from Side to Side,Grey
feature_bullets: Most Durable Material: Heavy Duty Waterproof Vinyl, bonded with soft, non-scratch backing. Non-fading and aging
Set of 4 covers: Fits 32" - 34.5" tire diameters. Fit wheels for RV, Travel Trailer, Motorhome, Class A, Class C, 5th wheel, Jeep, SUV, car, truck, camper. Please measure before purchasing
Multi-Function: Keep the tires and wheels from rain while your vehicle is parked. And the tire cover is easy to clean, wipe only with clean water.
Secure Fit: Elasticized back hem and Eyelet with cord ensures more secure fit, will not be blown away by the heavy wind

Warranty: 3 years warranty, within the Warranty Period, We always offer excellent after-sale service for this item; Any issues with your order, please contact us directly, we'll respond within 24 hours to make it right

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars289 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
